# location

**Instance Property**

The value to use when searching for location-triggered reminders.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var location: CLPlacemark? { get }
```

## Discussion

When the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSearchForNotebookItemsIntent/locationSearchType] property is [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INLocationSearchType/byLocationTrigger], search for reminders delivered when the user is near the location specified by this property.

## Searching for Tasks by Location

- **locationSearchType**: An indicator of how to apply location values to your search.
- **INLocationSearchType**: Constants indicating the type of location-based search to perform.
